item.description:
This event will be hosted by a guest organizer, Kelly. Thanks Kelly! All RSVP info/questions will be directed to her.


The Skyline Trail is a 7 mile loop with ups and downs but not too much elevation gain.

There is more info at this website:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

The loop takes about 3 1/2 hours when you stop for breaks. You should bring water and high energy snacks for yourself *and your dogs*!. Having foot traction (yak trax, stabilicers, or microspikes) is always a good idea at this time of year. If there has been recent snowfall that requires snowshoes, I will shorten the hike (maybe 3-4 miles) but still do it.


We will meet at the Sheepfold parking lot.
>
> From North:
> Interstate 93 South to exit 35. At stop sign, go left under highway. At next stop sign go right. At first set of lights turn right onto Route 28. Turn right into Sheepfold entrance.
>
> From South:
> Interstate 93 North to exit 33 (Route 28). Sheepfold entrance is 2 miles up on the leftâ€¦

Please contact Kelly with any questions!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be by the sign board in the Sheepfold parking lot.
item.name: Middlesex Fells - Skyline trail
